name: Snek (The Grumpy GameDev)
description:
A defold version of more or less the original Snake Byte.

Controls:

Z to start

Arrow keys

M toggles mute

What are the numbers in the corner for?

Upper left - the score of the current game

Upper right - the high score of the current session

Lower right - penalty timer... when this gets to zero, you get two penalty dots!
